DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics three different strength investigational product dosed twice day 7 day healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetic Study ABT-102 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Males Females condition general good health . Must willing participate studyrelated procedure . History significant sensitivity drug . Allergy soy lecithin , soybean , soybean oil , soybean derivative . A requirement medication , vitamin and/or herbal supplement study . Pregnant breastfeeding . History drug alcohol abuse . Positive Hepatitis HIV test . History certain medical condition uncontrolled medical illness . History certain gastrointestinal surgery may interfere gastrointestinal motility , PH absorption . Current participation another clinical study receipt investigational drug within past 6 week .
